description:
**EXPERIMENTAL.** Select and load an collection from the current back-end by metadata properties and returns matching collection ids.

A single collection can be selected using array operations such as ``first()``, ``last()`` and ``array_element()`` and afterwards be loaded using ``get_collection()``.

expression.description: An expression that is evaluated against each collection the back-end offers.

returns.description: An array of matching collection ids.

items.description: Each element is a job id.
